transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, good morning sir.
Executive: Haanji sir, mai account management se baat kar rahi hu aapki IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan sir aapne kal bataya tha ki aapke isme kal ticket raise kar chuki ki aapko buyleads vagera jo hai show nahi kar rahi hai abhi irrelevant matlab aa rahi hai basically mostly.
Customer: Ji maine aapke madam hai na Manju madam.
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Customer: Unse bhi baat bhi kiya tha unko bheja bhi tha maine kya naam hai screenshot bhi bheja tha maine ek baar check karne ko aap.
Executive: Kya kya bol rahe ho sir ek baar repeat karna?
Customer: Madam ko bheja tha aap sab kuch.
Executive: Manju mam se aapki baat hui thi?
Customer: Haan sir baat to hua tha unko maine bheja tha check karne ko ek baar.
Executive: Wo mai unse coordinate kar lungi abhi jaise mai unse puch lungi ki aapne unse kya bheja tha unko. Ah buyleads me jaise aap mujhe kal aapne raise kari thi ticket and aapne fir buyleads consume bhi kari hui hai ye teen to ye teen konse wale products ki thi?
Customer: Matlab ki jitne bhi consume karta hu na jitne bhi leads.
Customer: Pehle to wo leads ko requirement hi nahi hai bolte hai ki sir mujhe koi requirement hi nahi hai maine jo kiya tha kisi aur ke liye kiya tha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Ho gaya pehla ji. Aur dusra ji mai keh raha hu ki please ek aur check kijiye ki waha pe mere ko ek bhi lead nahi aa raha hai chaar din se paanch din se.
Executive: Sir MLM ki jo aap bol rahe hai ki aapko buyleads nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Right yahi bol rahe hai na ki aapko MLM ki particular chahiye.
Executive: To MLM ki jo sir buyleads jo hai wo piche se hi nahi aa rahi hai. Less aa rahi hai wo bahut kam matlab bahut hi kam aa rahi hai.
Customer: Madam aisa to possible nahi hai jaha tak mai dekh pa raha hu na.
Customer: Mere paas already 15 account hai ek to Bombay ka account hai ek to Jaipur ki meri company hai Jaipur se bhi hai. Unke account me to proper check ho raha hai wo cheeze.
Executive: Dekhiye sir mai jaise agar aapko multi level marketing software wale ki agar batau to abhi tak aaj bhi 19 tarikh ho gayi 19-20 tarikh iski jo requirement abhi tak aayi hai na wo 58 hi aayi hai.
Customer: Mere paas ek bhi nahi hai na 58 to mere paas ek bhi nahi hai na.
Executive: Aapko yaad hoga ki MLM maine abhi us time pe add kara tha aapke paas jab aapne mujhe bataya tha right?
Customer: Sir jab se aapne add kiya na madam.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Jab se add karne ke baad to matlab ye service activate karne ke baad madam na matlab bahut apne account pura kharab ho gaya.
Executive: Ab sir add to maine product kare the wo aapne jo jo bataye the wahi kare the. Aur rahi MLM wale ki buyleads ki baat to wo hamare piche se hi wo bahut less aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji correct hai correct hai correct hai.
Executive: Aur MLM software development services ki agar mai buyleads dekhu to abhi tak wo aath hi aayi hui hai.
Customer: Okay agar aap.
Executive: To ji ye wala particular aap uski jo buyleads ki bol rahe hai na to ye wale buyleads ka piche se ye jo flow hai wo bahut less chal raha hai.
Executive: Is wajah se aapko nahi aa rahi hai wo theek hai. Aur jo calls vagera inquiries vagera ka agar hum dekhe to wo ab aapko aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi call to bilkul bhi nahi aata call to aata hi nahi aap check karna call to kabhi nahi aate.
Executive: Aapko bhai kal aapko ek inquiry aayi thi online shopping system ki aayi thi. Jaskaran se theek hai. Ajmer se aayi thi inki location hai to aapne inse baat kari thi?
Customer: Haan bola sorry baat karta hu.
Executive: Accha kal kal aayi parso aayi thi aapko aur 16 tarikh ko bhi aapko ek Rajasthan se hi aayi. Matlab ye to I think thi aapko aayi thi.
Customer: Naam batayenge to hi malum pad jayega madam.
Executive: Isme naam mention nahi hai actually ye IndiaMART ke through aayi thi na isliye isme naam mention nahi hai.
Executive: Aur 15 tarikh ko bhi aayi thi aapko e-commerce website development ki aayi thi Imran ki taraf se aayi thi.
Customer: 9 din pehle se Imran ki taraf se mera bacha phone liya tha usne kuch kar diya hoga.
Executive: Accha aapne kabhi inse baat kari thi to inhone ye bola ki ye interested nahi hai right?
Customer: Right mere bache ne kar diya hoga theek hai.
Executive: To sir jaise mai yaha pe dekh pa rahi hu abhi 6 tarikh ko bhi aapko aayi thi customize software solution services ki. To inse ye India se hi Rejul naam ke customer hai inke to in inse to aapne baat kari hogi?
Customer: Madam aap screenshot check kar lijiye maine whatsapp pe screenshot de diya hai aur actually mere account me dekhiye maine level create karke waha pe mention kar diya hai ki kya reason hai kitne ke andar. To maine waha pe mention kiya us baat ko. Ek ek cheez mai baar baar se bataunga aapko.
Executive: Aapne usme add kar diya hai?
Customer: Correct hai. Ek ek cheez ko baar baar to time bhi aapka kharab hoga mera bhi kharab hoga time. Ek ek cheez maine bata diya waha pe mention hai cheeze aap open karenge to aapko cheeze dikh jayegi waha pe kya customer ki problem hai.
Executive: Wo aapne add kara wo sab maine bhi dekha hai but mai aapko ye bata rahi hu ki aap jo particular mere se demand kar rahe hai ki humse demand kar rahe hai ki MLM ki chahiye mujhe. To sir MLM ki to piche se hi less aa rahi hai na buyleads.
Customer: Theek hai theek.
Executive: Ab usme hum log bhi matlab ab jab buyleads ka need hogi kisi ko need hogi to ab buylead aayegi ab wo buylead hamare paas aayegi to wo aapke paas bhi jayegi.
Customer: Nahi ji nahi ji baat yaad mujhe check kiya pata hi hai maine dusre account check kar rahi hai to baat kar raha hu madam.
Customer: Aapne kya aapne pehle kya kaha sir mere paas 50-60 aa rahe hai 50-60 aa rahe hai theek hai. To 50-60 to hamare samajhiye baat ko aap.
Executive: To buyleads aapko mai bata rahi hu na aapko software development wali chahiye na. MLM ka software development. Uski aath buyleads aayi hui hai. Aur wo jo dusra maine 58 wala bataya wo multi level wala bataya maine.
Customer: Haan dono chahiye dono dono dono wahi hai.
Executive: Ab jiski aath valid aayi hai ab ho sakta hai aapne jab product add karwaya wo usse pehle aayi ho aath. 20 din ho gaye hai ab is wale month ko.
Customer: Actually maine aapko samajh me. Hamare paas to ye product to sabse add hai na.
Executive: MLM wala to sir maine khud add karaya hai abhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi aapko kuch yaad nahi hai aap aapko to samajh me nahi aati hai. Aap aapne isliye na sabse aapko khud dikh jayega sab kuch me dikha sakta hu aapko. Ek kaam hone do iska category check karo category to sab sahi hai na ho sakta hai category nahi sahi hai isliye nahi aa raha ho. Category ek baar check use kar.
Executive: Okay category maine abhi aapko call kari na isse pehle proper ekdam sab wo kari iske groups vagera maine ab check karke ekdam kar diye hai jisse aapko particular chahiye the. To groups vagera ka kaam bhi maine pehle karke uske baad hi aapko fir maine call kara hai. Aur ek do ke baki hai wo mai abhi call jaise kategi uske baad mai iske groups har ek uski check karke uske group aur category ko dono ko same kar dungi aapki theek hai. Aur jaise raha buyleads ka to buyleads ka flow hamare waha se piche se kam hai but mai try karti hu yaha pe ki aapke jo groups vagera mai theek kar du to iske buyleads aane lage. Queries dekhiye sir aapko pata hi hoga pehli baat to aapko kaha pe check kar sakte hai lead manager ke through right. Jaise agar abhi aap check nahi kar pa rahe hai queries to maine abhi aapko bataya ki aapko direct inquiry kaise kaise aayi hui hai aap mere ko bol rahe the ki aayi hi nahi hogi mujhe.
Mujhe.
Executive: Maine aapko fir particular ek ek din ki batai to aapne bola.
Customer: Problem problem kya hai madam na ki aap proper koi cheez check nahi kar pa rahi problem yaha pe aa rahi hai ye bhi. Theek hai aapko aapko maine complaint kiya hai usme bhi maine mention kar rakha tha aap usko padhiye na maine kya waha pe likha gaya hai kuch to likha hoga na aisa. Aage ka dekhe to kya likha hai party ne party ki party se baat kare koi matlab mujhe lagta nahi koi sense hai aap dekhiye usme kya humne likh rakha hai ki mere ko problem kaha se aa rahi hai wo aapko mention aapko malum padega.
Executive: Sir aap aapne basically likh rakha hai ki aapke jo dashboard pe hai wo relevant jo leads hai na. MLM ki aapko particular priority me chahiye software ki. Hmm. Aur jo 99% aapko jo leads aa rahi hai wo irrelevant hai. Hmm hmm hmm. Right yahi likha hai na aapne yahi complaint raise kari hai na. Hmm hmm hmm correct. To mai isi complaint ke regarding bata rahi hu ki MLM wale software ki hamare paas buyleads less hai. To aapke paas wo nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are not showing properly.

- Wants MLM buyleads.

- Account has become bad after service activation.

- Not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive will coordinate with Manju mam.

- Explained that MLM buyleads are less.

- Executive checked groups and categories.

- Will make group and category same.

- Explained how to check queries.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, mlm, software, category, groups
